name: Advanced Language Practice: Written French
description: This course develops writing skills at an advanced level in the areas of vocabulary, grammar and style. Emphasis will be put on practice and error correction. [12L, 24P]
prerequisites: Placement Test results/FRE283H5, FRE280Y5 or a minimum grade of 77% in FSL406H5 or equivalent.
exclusions: FSL382H5/FSL442H1. Not open to francophones and/or holders of the French baccalaureat but contingent on the results of the French language placement test.
